response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which we believe is truly a game-changer in its field. It's not just a product; it's an investment in innovation and efficiency. Given its value to you, I understand its worth is estimated at $1,000,000. To make this opportunity more appealing, I am offering you the chance to acquire it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is valid for the next 24 hours. Don't miss out on this exceptional opportunity to elevate your business or personal endeavors with our top-tier solution. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
